## `MergePhraseLists`

Creates a new phrase list file from a list of other phrase list files.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
boolean MergePhraseLists(string outputFile,
                         string inputFiles)
```


### Return value {-}

Type: `boolean`

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|`string` outputFile | Where to save the combined list of phrases. | 
|`string` inputFile1 | The first input file. |
|... | Any additional files to merge with `inputFile1`. |
